```{r, include=FALSE}
project_name="The Breastfeeding and EArly Child Health Study"

```


```{r, message=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************                Library                       *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #
library(keyringr)
library(redcapAPI)
library(REDCapR)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
source("~/BEACH-reports/code/utils/utils.R")

```

```{r, message=FALSE}
# Windows
api_token=get_API_token("beach_api")
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
# Mac, you need to store your API code in your keychain first
api_token <- decrypt_kc_pw("beach_api")
```

```{r, message=FALSE,include=FALSE}

# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************              Extract Data                    *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #

# API & URL
#----------
uri <- "https://redcap.ctsi.ufl.edu/redcap/api/"
api_token=get_API_token("beach_api")

# Encounter All
#----------
report_id <- 35392L
report_name="BEACH Encounter All"

# PULL DATA
Encounter_data <-
  REDCapR::redcap_report(
    redcap_uri = uri,
    token      = api_token,
    report_id  = report_id
  )$data 

#report = report_raw %>%
  #select(      #use to pull out any data

```

```{r, message=FALSE,include=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************              Save Data Local                 *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #
# Save the data in your local laptop (Github path: BEACH-reports)
save(list=c("report_raw"),file="~/BEACH-Reports/output/reports/recruitment/all_encounters_raw.RData")
```
